duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop standardized processes and governance for the BCP/DR program.
Implement resiliency policies and procedures, technical strategies, and disaster recovery planning for cloud solutions.
Manage recovery plan development and maintenance activities to ensure plans are current and compliant.
Ensure audit concerns are addressed using industry guidelines and best practices: Business Impact Analysis, Gap Analysis.
Track project milestones, identify and resolve issues, risks, and obstacles to meeting project goals and deadlines.
Provide project leadership for planning, advising, controlling, developing, and maintaining the Disaster Recovery program.
